title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: At work with J. Edgar Hoover, Stephen King’s literate assassin, making the most of time, the roots of a continent and more.
body:
From one of J. Edgar Hoover’s former assistants, a portrait of the FBI’s near-mythic founder. Review by Edward Kosner
Read the review
The British Empire kept a firm grip on its possessions by equating dissent with lawlessness. Review by Maxwell Carter
